OCD.name: Temporal Bar Graph
OCD.description: Takes tabular data and generates PostScript for a temporal bar graph.

AD.name: Label
AD.description: The field used to label the bar lines

AD.name: Start Date
AD.description: The field used for the starting date

AD.name: End Date
AD.description: The field used for the ending date

AD.name: Size By
AD.description: The field used to size the horizontal bar lines by

AD.name: Date Format
AD.description: The format of the start and end dates

AD.name: Query
AD.description: The query that created the data.

AD.name: Scale Output?
AD.description: If selected, all the bars will be fit into a single page. If not, 50 bars per page will be used.
